fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Instantly shoot a player during the day. (1 use)
- Instantly prosecute a player, using the dialy lynch on them. (1 use.)
- Instantly admire a dead player during the day, reviving them, they will be informed of a ToS2 (3942) reviving them and may accept or deny joining them, if they accept they become a random neutral that can win in the middle of the game, gain a permanent +1 tier of defense and you learn their role, if they reject they keep their role but you gain basic defense. (1 use.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, all neutrals who win in the middle of the game leave the townz counting as dead from now on and keeping their win.
- Youu forcespawn 2 neutrals that can win in the middle of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have 2 neutrals win, with at least one leaving the town.
